mapper.update: UPDATE o_blog.o_user u LEFT JOIN ( SELECT writer_id, COUNT(*) AS article_cnt, COALESCE(SUM(`like`), 0) AS total_likes FROM o_blog.o_article GROUP BY writer_id ) t ON u.id = t.writer_id SET u.article = COALESCE(t.article_cnt, 0), u.`like` = COALESCE(t.total_likes, 0) WHERE u.article != COALESCE(t.article_cnt, 0) OR u.`like` != COALESCE(t.total_likes, 0)
